author: Clif Brown
comment: I have a FLIR ONE GEN 2 I bought in March 2017. It worked great on my Samsung S7 with the app at that time, and is the app shown in the user manual. However FLIR updated the app and my phone updated it automatically, and now there is no more live view and the app doesn't really work. Very disappointed with losing the use of this expensive device.

author: Erik Husby
comment: Flir One 1st gen device is not recognized by my OnePlus 2 phone. I've tried various micro USB to USB-C adapters that support USB OTG, but no luck. The issue must be that the device hardware or this app's software is not compatible with my phone.

author: Rex Smith
comment: Since today's update, I am unable to use the regular camera on the phone.  Did something in this update disable my phone's ability to access it's built in camera?

author: Andrew Schnellinger
comment: Updates always break stuff. Couldn't load calibration info after update. Cleared cache and storage for app then worked.

author: Ghiath Hamsho
comment: I have just receive my flir one pro today Amazing.... realy Amazing  "You can see what the others can't" Very happy to work with it Its work fine with my Samsung note 8 .... Highly Recommended

Following an update this app has become glitchy and temperamental with my FLIR One. It's always asking for the camera to be reconnected, mis-reporting a low battery, and failing to load calibration data.  The latter is probably why it now shows all spot temperatures as '<-50C'.  Did no one test this before release?

author: Mike Senn
comment: No ability to save to camera phone storage. Who the hell wants to have to open a special app to see photos?

author: b crow
comment: There is no way to turn off the watermark. This is not acceptable for what I had to pay for the camera.

author: Michael Dockery
comment: Samsung galaxy7 does not recognize it.  I tried micro to usb c adapters.  No luck

author: Adrian Salter
comment: Gen 2 flir one no longer connects to app. No customer support. Thanks a bunch

author: Keith james
comment: Interface could be better, have all camera settings in one place! Live view and video is really choppy at best . Should have option to make view more compatible with device EX frame rate update, and resolution.  If I use my Flir one pro with the other thermal app the update on live view is GREAT not choppy BUT that app doesn't work right either. Anyway I really think you can do more to make these Flir ones more flexible with phones allowing more update settings to get the BEST viewing experience.  If you fix things I'll be sure to update review.  Fix you Flir tools app too see that review

author: Leon Harmse
comment: This app is very basic for such an expensive product. A lot of flaws. It does not even update its photos to the galery without a restart. Hopefully FLIR will continue improving it.

author: Håvard Husevåg Garnes
comment: Abysmal ui. It's impossible to pinch measurement areas to the correct size. All images get a watermark with the flir logo. App thinks it's on an iPhone, and sends me to the iPhone contact page when i click contact flir.

author: Garret Kruger
comment: My $400 flir one worked for a total of 1 year before flir decided that I should buy a new model rather than updating their software to work with OS updates. I'll never buy another product from this company.

author: Jon Jacobson
comment: I'm having issues with setting fixed temperature ranges and parallax.  The settings don't persist once set. Using FLIR One Pro V3 with Samsung Note 8. Other issues include the IR Scale is not included in the video recording and when sharing the video through the gallery, the file is not actually attached to an email.

author: Paul Hansen
comment: Watermark you can't get rid of without using a third party app. Unacceptable especially for a "pro" product.

author: PHAT MOOSE
comment: Does not work with Samsung s8 using USB c adapter

author: sayyed hashem sajjadi
comment: My note 8 dosnt detect the flir one gen 2, i connect it by using an adaptor (micro usb to usb-c

author: Karl Gallivan
comment: Does not work with my new Note 8 with a usb adapter? Please advise...

author: Hossein Safaei
comment: Not work on cat s60

author: Domenech Laurent
comment: Fonctionne pas avec ma tablette android 7.1, camera inutilisable...

author: Zoroastro Cucurullo
comment: Works with Oneplus 5 running Oreo 8.0, just enable OTG on your phone.

author: CN Guru
comment: Camera record problematic

author: Troy Lonie
comment: Works fine with my Pixel 1.

author: Garrett Johnson
comment: Love ot

author: Oleg Rodjer
comment: Dear Flir Support, we have written you several times - Please add Highest and Lowest temperature bar. Also display of the temperature of the hottest and coldest points, this is done by Seek App. A lot of people buy that Seek device just because of that missing feature.  Why you and your programmers do not listen to that opinions.

author: J Colter
comment: Just received my gen 3 earlier today, plugged it in to charge, set it up on my Galaxy S8, and it seems to work as intended.   I am curious if the people giving this app bad reviews knew that they needed to plug the ONE in to charge before use?

author: jerimy stevens
comment: Flir 1, 2nd gen, works with my Note 8, USB type C... I have the 2nd generation Flir 1 and I love it. I recently upgraded to a Samsung Note 8. The stock USB type C to micro USB did not work with the camera. I found that most adapters are not USB "OTG". I found a OTG adaptor and it works! Search "USB type C to micro OTG"

author: Christian s
comment: Ok.. After talking to support it now works on oneplus 5.. To all the people having problems with the phone registering the FLIR. Go to settings, advanced, activate OTG storage.. And your good to go 👍🏻

author: Val Yel
comment: The updates in 2017 have messed up its otherwise great features. E.g. when I screen outside with a slightly below freezing point environment it shows extremely low tems - e.g. some minus 35 when it us in fact -5-7 Celcius...

author: Topher McBearslayer
comment: Doesn't work with Flir One Pro v3. Detects the camera but only shows a black screen. Has all permissions. No permutation of disconnecting and reconnecting works. There's a reason this product is so poorly reviewed. You were warned.

author: Scott Plough
comment: Flir, can you please add high temp and low temp "spot" tools so we can add one, or both, to the screen for max/min readings. It's a function that's built into nearly all thermal imaging camera software, including Seek's.  At this point, without that functionality, I can't recommend the FlirOne due to this major oversight.

author: David Powell
comment: Fails to connect to the FLIR One V3 on Nokia 8 phone (keeps on connecting/disconnecting) and when it does finally connect, the app hangs.

author: Steve ASY
comment: doesn't work with Samsung S8. have contacted support. so far they have been unhelpful. told me to wait for an update. which there have been 2 since. still not working

author: Nigel Oh
comment: Doesn't work with my Samsung 8 phone, and keeps crashing on my Samsung Tab S Tablet!

reply.author: FLIR Systems, INC
reply.content: Please get in touch with our support team for assistance: FLIRONE-Support@flir.com.

author: simon harper
comment: Does not detect hardware with OP2, also tried OTG cables. Lame.

author: Matthew Gaylord
comment: Worked fine on my S5, but I can't get it to connect on my S8. The app says plug in the camera but it never responds to it when I plug it in and turn it on.

author: Jeff Vance
comment: Works ok on LG V20 with the FlirOne Pro. Log in requirement has been removed. No complaints as of yet.

author: Diane Attaway
comment: Does not work.

author: Kyle Hershberger
comment: There has been dramatic improvement to this application.  I am currently quite pleased with it.
